thread.title: Guess the secret of living a long life!
thread.title_full: Guess the secret of living a long life!

author: NewsWire
title: Guess the secret of living a long life!
text:
Added on October 8, 2015 NewsWire Guess the secret of living a long life! 0 0 0 0 0 
Washington D.C., Oct. 8 (ANI): The world’s oldest person, Susannah Mushatt Jones, has revealed her secret for a long life! It’s bacon. 
The 116-year-old enjoys a diet of daily bacon, eggs, and grits, and she is such a big fan of the meat, that she even had a bacon-themed cake for her latest birthday, E!Online reports. 
Jones also has a sign in her kitchen which says “Bacon makes everything better.” 
According to The Guinness Book of World Records, Jones is officially the world’s oldest person as of July. (ANI)
